intro: Haplosticha, commonly known as the silver leaf plant, is a species of flowering plant in the family Asteraceae. It is characterized by its silver-gray foliage, which is covered in fine, dense hairs. The plant produces small, yellowish flowers that bloom in clusters, typically during the summer months. Haplosticha is native to regions of southern Africa and is often cultivated as an ornamental plant due to its attractive appearance. It prefers well-drained soil and full sun exposure for optimal growth.
